task.title: Shutting down the appliance by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can shut down the appliance by using the device shutdown command on the command line.

taskbody.context: You can shut down the appliance by using the command line, or by using the . For more information about using the to shut down the appliance, see .

step.cmd: To shut down the appliance, enter the following command:
step.info: device shutdownIf you are connected to the command line through a network connection, your network connection is ended during the shutdown. If you want to see all the messages for the full shutdown cycle, you must be connected directly to the appliance.
